The Giants season is on the brink. In most years, a team with a 5-9 record wouldnt still be in contention for the playoffs. Alas, NFC East.
If the Giants can pull off an upset against the Baltimore … [+2974 chars]

articles.description: Doc Rivers joked Thursday about Ben Simmons' postgame shooting partner after the Sixers' win on opening night. By Noah Levick
articles.content:
